title: Leo Leona
body:
Hi! continuing with the zodiac skinline, this time is Leona representing Leo.

The regent of Leo is the sun, they are the kings of the zodiac, a lot of splendor and natural leadership attributes, so Leona was like a perfect fit for it... other characters that I had on my mind for this concept were Azir (king of shurima and in a way he represent the sun) and Qiyana (she represent "the bad side" of the sign, being that she seems to be quite egocentric and narcissistic, also a leader). Hope you enjoy this concept ty.

https://imgur.com/xOPXj4z

Aries - https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/i2EB0gLl-zodiac-patheon
Taurus - https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/OhqTZrLE-taurus-taliyah
Gemini - https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/JIbr36RV-gemini-leblanc
Cancer - https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/aMs9uQog-zodiac-diana

replies.body:
I doubt that they continue with this skinline, because eventually they would have to release a Scorpio Skarner and Rito hasn't released a skin for him for 4.5 years.


_We await our time._
lmao u acting like riot cant find a way to make yasuo or akali look some what like a scorpion

Skarner who?

Also cool skin, but i cant get past that hair cut,

> [{quoted}](name=FrancisMuni,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=oUyPwGsd,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-11-06T13:03:50.326+0000)
>
> I doubt that they continue with this skinline, because eventually they would have to release a Scorpio Skarner and Rito hasn't released a skin for him for 4.5 years.
> 
> 
> _We await our time._

Urgot would get scorpio skin ðŸ˜…
HES A CRAB THOUGH
Virrrgoooooo !!!!! At least tell me who u have in mind for Virgo!?

Hi hehehe...I have Irelia in my mind for Virgo, the code I used for picking someone base on sign traits in Virgo's case were clean/maiden/perfectionist...and irelia she's a dancer, and dancers for me are quite perfectionist, she also feels maiden and well you need to be clean (gameplay wise) to play a great irelia.

who would you like? and why?
Clean... maiden.... perfectionist.... Three words that do not describe me (I am a Virgo)...

why is Soraka not Aries...Aries is a ram which is close to goat which soraka is...or Kindred could be Aries or even Braum im pretty sure hes a goat hearder and i would love to see him dressed like a goat

Aquarius Miss Fortune?

(Only asking cause I love MF, and I am an Aquarius)

:)

I love MF as well...and I'm thinking of making her a scorpio, since the she kinda represent the code I used for it (secrets/sex/power/revenge) but I feel that people are going to be pissed off if I don't make skarner :c so why not both? XD

> [{quoted}](name=Leu07,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=oUyPwGsd,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2019-11-07T13:30:18.417+0000)
>
> I love MF as well...and I'm thinking of making her a scorpio, since the she kinda represent the code I used for it (secrets/sex/power/revenge) but I feel that people are going to be pissed off if I don't make skarner :c so why not both? XD

Oh, both is fine. My reply was mostly me joking around, lol, but if did do Scorpio Miss Fortune, I wouldn't mind. 

{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
{{sticker:sg-soraka}}  where her hair at tho
:c when I started this concept she had the hair, but I wasn't feeling leona vibes from it, so I gave her a joan of arc wig hahaha and she looked so right

> [{quoted}](name=Leu07,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=oUyPwGsd,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-11-06T18:21:58.335+0000)
>
> :c when I started this concept she had the hair, but I wasn't feeling leona vibes from it, so I gave her a joan of arc wig hahaha and she looked so right

i mean i like the design over all but as a closed minded support player I cant see Leona going from long hair to short hair, then again I can't see Soraka with short hair or really any champ with long hair going to short hair, aside from yasuo..... I do so love his og concept, but thats just preference

the mane behind her head and head piece is pretty cool though
Yeah the idea with the mane is that in game she look like she have her long hair still

Love your zodiac skin posts and I'm anticipating for the other signs you haven't done yet.
Any thoughts on which champion you have planned for Aquarius?
hi! well for Aquarius I wanna make Illaoi, for her philosophy of keep moving foward. I think that's an Aquarius mentality...do you have someone in mind?

libra ?

{{champion:412}} cause of the balance being his weapon
{{champion:98}}  cause he represent balance 
or 
{{champion:10}} cause justice

well....I wanted to make Libra Kayle but dunno I think Im going to hit a wall like I did with diana, leona and pantheon where it looks like a vu or "how they should look like" or is not that different from their baseskin.
So the other option was Shen but lately my mind have been whispering me T A R I C bitch...so dunno XD
Hands down my favourite so far!
thank you so much
It could be a VS Event skin (and u Just Chose side) XD
I think it should be more lion focused.  I can't see the shield, but if it had a huge lion face on it it would be neat.  A large lion head with a mane like the sun etc.  Cool skin idea.
hey! thanks.. yeah the shield is a lion face, kinda like the shoulder and knee pads, I really liked the illusion of a lion mane with the headpiece
Your Taurus and Gemini links are switched.
thanks! I fixed it
